subject: Cricket (Game)
Afghanistan War (2001- )
Refugees and Displaced Persons
lead_paragraph: Cricketing contrast rarely comes more vividly than it will on Saturday when India plays Afghanistan on day two of the World Twenty20 tournament on the West Indian island of Saint Lucia.
snippet: Cricketing contrast rarely comes more vividly than it will on Saturday when India plays Afghanistan on day two of the World Twenty20 tournament on the West Indian island of Saint Lucia.
